conference.content:
[PHPDetroit](https://phpdetroit.io) is a three-day, regional PHP conference that brings the community together to learn and grow. We're preceding the conference with a 2 track tutorial day that will feature 4 sessions covering various topics. We will also be running an UnCon alongside the main tracks on Friday and Saturday, where attendees can share unscheduled talks.
The conference is scheduled to run **July 26th - July 28th**, at the beautiful [Detroit Marriott Livonia.](http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/dtwli-detroit-marriott-livonia/) We welcome developers and enthusiasts of all skill levels to come join us while we discuss the latest trends and technologies in our industry.
We look forward to seeing you in Detroit, and making the first ever [PHPDetroit Conference](https://phpdetroit.io) a huge success.
